data.title: Hometown USA
data.meta_description: This event kicks off with a patriotic golf cart parade then continues at the ballpark with a live band, outdoor movie, games, face painting, and ending the night with a grand firework show.
data.text:
This event kicks off with the Dunedin Goes Carting patriotic golf cart parade through downtown Dunedin to TD Ballpark. The celebration continues at the ballpark with a live band, outdoor movie, games, face painting, and a grand firework show. The band will play in the 3rd base concourse area; seating is limited. Grandstand seating will be open to watch the movie and fireworks; no field access.

Patriotic Golf Cart Parade: 6:00 pm

Stadium gates open: 6:30 pm

Modern Measure Band: 7-9:15 pm and after the fireworks until 10:45 pm

Movie: The Little Rascals: 7:30 pm

Fireworks: approx. 9:15 pm (weather permitting)

$ Free to attend. Ballpark concessions available for purchase.

Free limited parking available at TD Ballpark, Dunedin Library, and Hale Senior Activity Center.

This event is presented by Dunedin Parks & Recreation. For more information, call 727-812-4530 or email us.
